author: gstein
msg: Continuing refining of the entries reading.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/entries.c:
(write_entry): a schedule delete can happen for a node in a copied
subtree, so there isn't always a base node. add a bit of logic to try
and determine when to create (or not) a BASE row. also, when we write
out not-present rows, go ahead and include the kind.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/wc_db.c:
(svn_wc__db_base_get_info, svn_wc__db_read_info): only return an
obstructed status if we *expect* the subdir to be present.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Fix bug in build system - everything must go through libtool to work.
* build/generator/gen_make.py
(_extension_map): All objects must go to .lo's not .o.

author: hwright
msg: * www/svn_1.6_releasenotes.html
(sqlite): Tweak the recommended version and requirement wording.

author: gstein
msg: Further fixes to managing entries in the sqlite database.
- when writing a schedule_normal entry, we might write a WORKING_NODE row
or a BASE_NODE row depending on whether the node is copied.
- no need to individually delete BASE or WORKING rows since we fully blast
them each time we write out entries.
- better handling of copied nodes: set schedule_normal and their revision
to whatever was copied.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/entries.c:
(read_entries): capture the copyfrom node's revision for use in all
copied children. the children should be schedule_normal rather than
schedule_add.
(write_entry): stop deleting rows. select a BASE or WORKING node based
on whether the entry is copied.

author: gstein
msg: Minor cleanups to make harvest_committables() a bit easier to read.
* subversion/libsvn_client/commit_util.c:
(harvest_committables): rename PARENT_DIR param to PARENT_ADM. when
computing TARGET within the loop, don't be sneaky with join_many. use
a plain old "if" and (hey!) it can even a copy. change a use of
path_split() to dirent_dirname() since the basename wasn't used.
